scripts.bun-example: bun src/cli.ts measure -r bun --output output.txt src/example.js
scripts.bun-example-2: bun src/cli.ts measure -r bun --output output.txt src/example2.js
scripts.node-example: node src/cli.ts measure -r node --output output.txt src/example.js
scripts.node-example-2: node src/cli.ts measure -r node --output output.txt src/example2.js
